fields.description:
Description:
When testing Kitchen sink Base UI>Views>Email Dialog, there is no alert indicating that the mail was sent. There is the standard iOS "Whoosh" sound as the mail is sent however.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on the Verizon iPhone
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Email Dialog
3) Enter a real email address (to confirm receipt)
4) Send the mail

Result:
Whoosh sound but no alert.

Expected Result:
Alert (similar to iPad image attached)

Notes:
Did not occur in 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink Base UI>Views>Email Dialog does not present "complete" alert when sending mail
fields.environment: Verizon iPhone 4 (4.2.6) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3ecace11
